coreAttributes.name: Tentadrool Whip
coreAttributes.description: This vial contains a slime formed by abnormal fission during a arcane storm. Highly reactive to magic these slimes have been trained to serve as weapons.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(uncork)] the bottle for easy use, pushing the eager slime back down while giving it a bit of aura.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tickle)] the slime playful before resealing the bottle.
